org.deeplearning4j.earlystopping.scorecalc

Class DataSetLossCalculatorCG

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.earlystopping.scorecalc.DataSetLossCalculatorCG
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ScoreCalculator<ComputationGraph>
    Deprecated. 
    Use DataSetLossCalculator instead for both MultiLayerNetwork and ComputationGraph

    @Deprecated
public class DataSetLossCalculatorCG
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScoreCalculator<ComputationGraph>
    Given a DataSetIterator: calculate the total loss for the model on that data set. Typically used to calculate the loss on a test set.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
